mapper.select: SELECT media_introduce AS mediaIntroduce ,region AS region ,ad_category AS adCategory ,media_url AS mediaUrl FROM adin_media_introduce WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email}

SELECT media_order as mediaOrder ,ad_detail_category as adDetailCategory ,media_title as mediaTitle ,media_summary as mediaSummary ,media_detail_explain as mediaDetailExplain ,thumbnail_img_nm as thumbnailImgNm ,thumbnail_origin_file_nm as thumbnailOriginFileNm ,thumbnail_img_file_path as thumbnailImgFilePath ,media_price as mediaPrice FROM adin_media_register WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email} AND media_order = ( SELECT MAX(media_order) FROM adin_media_register WHERE email = #{email} )
